attributes.action: remain in power for another 8 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i believe all the problems that you have dealt with is absolutely excellent
as prime minister with such a low percentage of voters i am at a loss to see why you are not liked as much as you should be  as your definitly the best prime minister ever.Now please gb dont listen to your advisors they mucked up enough,bring in a law that anyone under 25 carrying a knife  without lawful excuse or caught with a knife gets  a mandatory 8 year sentence,
make sure you also say the population of the prison is getting to a crucial stage we are building new wings and 23 hour lock up will be as it says,1 more thing dont try to get out of the fuelthing it aint gonna work no matter who was in power it would have happened
but cut the duty on fuel tax by 20 pence and recoup it on the whole public sectopr pay rises obviuosly telling the public we all have to share the good and bad times

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
